name: Spilled #GGJ22
description:
2022 Global Game Jam Entry - Spilled

A interactive tribute to "Split" by Vincenzo Lodigiani. A game about the clash between eastern dialectics and Hegelian dialectics. Find pairs and progress in the game.

Dogan "Nebuch" Cetin

Enes Bilgin

Additional Design:

Deniz Ege Tunçay

Ferdi Şen
